Package cz.fel.cvut.openk8s.migration.service

Interface OpenshiftService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OpenshiftServiceBean
    public interface OpenshiftService
    This service is used to manage connection to OpenShift cluster

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearRollback()
      Clears data for rollback
      void destroy()
      Destroys user session and connection to the cluster
      StatusResource init​(java.lang.String ocIp, java.lang.String authType, java.lang.String token, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      This method creates connection to OpenShift cluster.
      java.util.List<MigrationResultResource> migrate​(java.util.List<KubernetesResource> itemsList)
      Migrates selected items to OpenShift cluster.
      java.util.List<MigrationResultResource> rollback()
      Does a migration rollback.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        StatusResource init​(java.lang.String ocIp,
                    java.lang.String authType,
                    java.lang.String token,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        This method creates connection to OpenShift cluster. Connection is tested with listing namespaces command
        Parameters:
        ocIp - URL of OpenShift cluster master
        authType - authentication type. Use 'basic' for Basic authentication, 'token' for ServiceAccount or User token
        username - username, is used only with 'basic' authentication type
        password - password, is used only with 'basic' authentication type
        token - ServiceAccount or User token, is used only with 'token' authentication type
        Returns:
        status of connection

      • rollback

        java.util.List<MigrationResultResource> rollback()
        Does a migration rollback.
        Returns:
        status of rollback
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if cluster connection was not initialized or was expired

      • clearRollback

        void clearRollback()
        Clears data for rollback

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroys user session and connection to the cluster

      • migrate

        java.util.List<MigrationResultResource> migrate​(java.util.List<KubernetesResource> itemsList)
        Migrates selected items to OpenShift cluster. If errors occured during some item migration, it will not influence other items migration
        Parameters:
        itemsList - list of items to migrate (see KubernetesResource)
        Returns:
        list of migration results
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if cluster connection was not initialized or was expired
